databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.TANKA , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.SEND_FLAG , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.DATA_NO , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.USER_KEY , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.RENEW_DATE , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.TS ,
MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.SHOW_ORDER, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI.SHOW_ORDER
FROM MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET
INNER JOIN MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE ON MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID = MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID INNER JOIN MS_SI_SHOKUMEI ON MS_SI_SHOKUMEI.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID
WHERE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.SHOW_ORDER, MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI.SHOW_ORDER

INSERT INTO MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET( MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , TANKA , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET_ID , :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :TANKA , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET SET MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID = :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , TANKA = :TANKA , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET_ID = :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_SET_ID
